params.name: hidden_size
params.description: Dimensionality of the encoder layers and the pooler layer.

params.name: output_channels
params.description: Dimensionality of the output channels in the Patch Encoder.

params.name: num_hidden_layers
params.description: Number of hidden layers in the Transformer encoder.

params.name: num_attention_heads
params.description: Number of attention heads for each attention layer in the Transformer encoder.

params.name: num_channels
params.description: Number of channels in the input image.

params.name: image_size
params.description: Expected resolution. Target size of the resized input image.

params.name: patch_size
params.description: Size of the patches to be extracted from the input image.

params.name: hidden_act
params.description: The non-linear activation function (function or string)

params.name: layer_norm_eps
params.description: The epsilon used by the layer normalization layers.

params.name: attention_dropout
params.description: The dropout ratio for the attention probabilities.

params.name: initializer_range
params.description: The standard deviation of the truncated_normal_initializer for initializing all weight matrices.

params.name: qkv_bias
params.description: Whether to add a bias to query, key, value projections.

params.name: use_abs_pos
params.description: Whether to use absolute position embedding.

params.name: use_rel_pos
params.description: Whether to use relative position embedding.

params.name: global_attn_indexes
params.description: The indexes of the global attention layers.

params.name: mlp_dim
params.description: The dimensionality of the MLP layer in the Transformer encoder.
